description: Simplify the process of requesting and approving expense reimbursements.
name: Expense Reimbursement Form

steps.title: Expense Reimbursement Request
steps.text: This form is designed to ensure that your expenses are processed quickly and accurately. Please fill out all the necessary fields with as much detail as possible and attach any relevant receipts or supporting documents.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address for communication regarding the reimbursement.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Enter your phone number for any necessary follow-up.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Manager/Supervisor Name
blocks.help: Enter the name of your manager or supervisor for approval.
blocks.name: supervisor

blocks.label: Date of Expense
blocks.help: Specify the date when the expense was incurred.
blocks.name: date

blocks.label: Expense Category
blocks.help: Select the category of the expense.
blocks.name: category

blocks.label: Expense Description
blocks.help: Provide a brief description of the expense.
blocks.name: expense_description

blocks.label: Amount
blocks.help: Enter the total amount to be reimbursed.
blocks.name: amount

blocks.label: Currency
blocks.help: Select the currency of the expense amount.
blocks.name: currency

blocks.label: Payment Method Used
blocks.help: Indicate the method used to pay for the expense.
blocks.name: payment_method

options.options: Personal Credit Card, Business Credit Card, Cash, Other

blocks.label: Receipt Attachment
blocks.help: Upload a copy of the receipt or any supporting documents.
blocks.name: receipt

blocks.label: Additional Notes
blocks.help: Optional: Provide any additional information or context for the expense.
blocks.name: notes

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to verify the accuracy of the information provided.
blocks.name: signature
